entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
